revised_title: Magma Genesis in the Lachlan Fold Belt: I- and S-Type Granite Sources
tldr: This article examines the sources of I- and S-type granites in the Lachlan Fold Belt, southeastern Australia. It concludes that most I-type granites have crustal sources with varying degrees of mantle-derived material, while S-type granites are derived from sedimentary rocks. The study provides insights into the relative contributions of mantle, oceanic crust, and continental crust to magma genesis.
